title: vaDa pazhani tigazh
sahitya:
vaDa pazhani tigazh vaDivEl murugan aDi tozhudiDuvAi anudinamu manamE


anupallavi

  viDaiyAt-tollaiyin piDippinai ellAm aDiyODu aghaTrum avanaruL pera nI


caraNam    aDuttiDum iDarait-taDuttu viDavum eDutta kAriyattai muDittu viDavum 
aDuttiDuvOrukku aLLi aLLi aruLai koDuttu varum oru koDai vaLLAga
